Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: I marked this as fixVersion v1.1 because if we are looking at pluggable crypto for TLS that is something post v1.0. I would suggest we make this epic a little clearer as to its intent. Either that or make the linked story an epic and close this one.

Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: ~JonathanLevi is there a reason this is now marked for v1.0? What work is still being done on this?

Action.author: jonathanlevi
Action.body: Nope, good point. Many other TLS-oriented JIRA items were opened (and some got closed) without referencing this Epic. We still need to so some stuff around TLS (some of it was carried out already in 1.0) - I do envision that we'll need for example the underlying FAB-2974 and others around it. Pushed to the next milestone. If we do not re-use JIRA item, e.g., in v1.1 - I will end up simply closing this. Thanks.

Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: As of v1.1, TLS and mutual TLS is supported for all components, documented, and used in samples. Closing this one. Moved FAB-2974 to a standalone feature.
